sources.description: geo.admin.ch is the geographical information platform of the Swiss Confederation within the Federal Administration. The usage is free but throttled to a maximum amount of requests per time. It is possible though to obtain higher API priviliges by submitting an application.

getaddress.io Simple APIs for UK addresses.
API key is needed: Please check API documentation for details and use API Registration to obain a key.
If you would like to add your own API please make a Pull Request via Github. More information can be found in the docs.
